texts.es:
Gladys es una persona muy humilde, amable, trabadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con sus padres y sus 2 pequeños hijos, lamentablemente por diversas razones se separó de su esposo, desde entonces ella es padre y madre para sus pequeños, ella dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, Gladys no pudo estudiar la carrera de Administración de Empresas que tanto quería, pero le hubiera gustado poder hacerlo, e sus ratos libres le gusta ve programas educativos y noticieros en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un  Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
 Gracias al apoyo de su Padre, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, día a día Gladys trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella inicia su labor brindando desayunos y almuerzos a sus comensales, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Gladys se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción de su vivienda, ya que ella desea poder hacer el techado de su hogar con materiales adecuados y resistentes; de esta manera Gladys podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose por sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys is a very humble, kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person living in the city of Ica in Parcona District with her parents and two small children.  Unfortunately, for various reasons she separated from her husband and since then has been both father and mother to her little ones.  She focuses all her efforts into moving her family forward.  Gladys was unable to study business administration like she wanted to but would have liked to have done so.  In her free time she enjoys watching educational and news programs on television and sometimes cooks a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” to share with her family.

Thanks to her father’s support and with much effort and enthusiasm, Gladys works in her small business selling food.  She starts her work very early in the morning serving breakfast and lunch to her diners.  She dedicated about 12 hours daily to her business and believes that she does well because of the tasty way she cooks and the kind customer service she provides.

Gladys is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to build her house since she wants to roof it with adequate, resistant materials.  In this way Gladys will provide increased security and wellbeing for her family and she will continue working and striving to move her family ahead.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Ruth Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Ruth es socia del banco comunal Señoras del Taguan, vive por la comunidad de San Bartolome que pertenece al cantón Sígsig, ubicado al Sureste de la Provincia del Azuay, su económica se sustenta en la agricultura, la manufactura y comercio, su gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, son personas amables y gentiles que luchan diariamente para mejorar su economía.

La Señorita Ruth tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera y está por  dar a luz su primer hijo, vive con su madre quien tiene un bar, la casa en la que vive es de propiedad de su madre.

Ella se dedica a la costura, trabaja en una fábrica de ropa hace un año, también en su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos, estas actividades las realiza para mejorar su economía. 

El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió comprando pollos y el alimento para sus animales, en la cancelación del mismo no tuvo ningún problema. Su nuevo crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar comida para sus pollos para continuar con su negocio que es la cría de pollos. 

La banca comunal le gusta porque su grupo es muy unido.
texts.en:
Srta. Ruth is a member of the Communal Bank "Señoras de Taguan" (Ladies of Taguan). The members live in the community of San Bartolome in the canton of Sigsig, located Southeast of the Azuay Province. Its economy is based in agriculture, manufacturing and business, and the people still maintain the culture and traditions of their towns. The people are friendly and kind, fighting daily to improve their economy. 

Srta. Ruth is 18 years old, single, is about to give birth to her first child, and lives with her mother who manages a bar. Her mother owns the house in which they live. 

Ruth works at a clothing factory and she has been in this job for one year and also, at home she also raises chickens. She does these activities to improve her finances.

The money from her previous loan was invested to purchase chickens and food for her animals, her repayment period presented no issues. Her new loan will be used to purchase food for her chickens, to continue her business in raising chickens to continue in her chicken raising business. 

She likes the communal bank because it is a very close group.

loans.use: to purchase chickens

loans.name: Jhonathan Richard

texts.es:
Jhonathan es un hombre de 26 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica en el distrito de Parcona, él es una muy amable, trabajador  y entusiasta, con un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil que tanto quería, pero sueña con poder lograrlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos.
Gracias al apoyo de su Padre, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo Jhonatan trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, desde tempranas horas de la mañana él sale a recorrer las calles de la ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él labora un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas donde encuentra más cliente.
Jhonatan se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de prendas de vestir tanto para damas y caballeros, las cuales venderá para poder iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa; de esta manera Jhonatan espera que todo le vaya bien para así poder conseguir ingresos económicos adicionales, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda iniciar sus estudios profesionales.
texts.en:
Jhonathan, 26, is single living in the city of Ica in Parcona District.  He’s very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic with a strong drive for improvement.  Sadly, because he needed to go to work and cover his expenses he was unable to study the career of civil engineering he so desired but dreams with doing so.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer with friends and neighbors.

Thanks to support from his father and with much dedication and enthusiasm, Jhonathan works as a mototaxi driver starting very early in the morning when he goes out to travel the city streets looking for passengers.  He works about 12 hours daily and believes he does well because he knows the zones where more customers can be found.

Jhonathan is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy clothes for men and women to sell thus starting a small clothing sales business.  In this way, Jhonatan hopes that everything will turn out well so that he can earn extra income in order to start his professional studies in the not too distant future.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some cheese.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis tiene 39 años, vive en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de plátano, níspero, frejoles, entre otros, tiene un clima muy frio en época de invierno, pero en verano es muy visitada por los turistas ya que podemos encontrar playas muy hermosas. Cuando Luis tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho leer el periódico y en especial desarrollar crucigramas, asimismo le gusta mucho la comida típica de nuestro país, por ello uno de sus platillos favoritos es el riquísimo Picante. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Mecánica Automotriz.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Luis logro comprar una mototaxi, en la cual trabaja de manera diaria ya que con ello logra llevar el sustento para su hogar, ya que es padre de 3 hijos a los cuales quiere muchísimo y a quienes saca adelante ya que quiere que sean mejores que él y junto a su esposa quienes es quien le da ánimos cada día paras seguir luchando; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y por ello trabaja con muchas ganas y sobre todo mucha paciencia.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una mototaxi, con lo cual podrá alquilarla y tendrá un ingreso mas para su hogar y poder seguir dándole educación a sus hijos y sobre todo seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Construir su casa de material noble ya que actualmente es de adobe”.
texts.en:
Luis, 39, lives in the city of Mala, a city noted for its agriculture especially bananas, medlar and broad beans, among others.  It’s very cold in the winter but in summer is visited by many tourists because beautiful beaches are found there.  When Luis has a little free time he enjoys reading the newspaper very much, especially to solve the crosswords.  He also enjoys the typical food of the country and one of his favorite dishes is the delicious “Picante.”  Due to his limited economic resources he was only able to finish 11th grade but would have liked to study auto mechanics very much.

With much effort and savings Luis managed to buy a mototaxi that he works daily producing sustenance for his home since he’s the father of three children he loves very much and wants to move ahead so that they will be better than him; his wife encourages him every day to continue striving.  He believes that he does well in his business because he very much wants to get ahead and because of that works hard and above all with much patience.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy a mototaxi that he’ll be able to lease out to have an additional source of household income and continue to give his children an education and above all continue striving daily to make his great dream a reality: to build his house out of substantial materials since it’s currently adobe.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Elizabeth Ruvineyda

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 20, vive en la ciudad de Ica en el distrito de Parcona con su pareja y su pequeña hija, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Elizabeth no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear con su familia por las acogedoras calles de la ciudad y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Rojos, él cual es uno de sus platos favoritos.
Gracias al apoyo de su Padre, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Elizabeth se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella inicia su labor y dedica a su trabajo un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, cree que le va bien ya que sus clientes acuden a ella ya que sus cerdos se encuentran bien alimentados y cuidados adecuadamente.
Elizabeth se encuentra  muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realiza la compra de alimento balanceado para sus cerdos, así también podrá cubrir los gastos de vacunación de los cerditos mas pequeños; de esta manera Elizabeth espera incrementar sus ventas e ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para la educación y bienestar de su pequeña.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 20, is a woman living in the city of Ica, Parcona District, with her spouse and little girl.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who together with her spouse focuses all their efforts into moving their family forward.  Unfortunately, Elizabeth was unable to study a professional career but would have liked to have studied business administration.  In her free time she enjoys going out for walks with her family along the welcoming streets in the city and sometimes she cooks some delicious “Tallarines Rojos” which is one of her favorite dishes.

Thanks to support from her father and with much effort and enthusiasm, Elizabeth works raising pigs to sell.  She starts her chores very early in the morning and spends about 10 hours daily at work.  She believes she does well because her customers come to her because her pigs are well-fed and cared for adequately.

Elizabeth is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she will be able to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her pigs and will also be able to pay to have the smallest pigs vaccinated.  In this way, Elizabeth hopes to increase sales and income that she wants to use for her little girl’s schooling and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy vaccines and feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Maura Olimpia

texts.es:
Maura tiene 65 años de edad, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se puede apreciar atractivos turísticos como la laguna de “Huacachina, la cual se ubica en medio de maravillosas dunas, en las cuales se practican deportes de aventura como el samboarding, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial se cultiva la uva, esparrago, pallares, frejoles, entre otros.  Cuando tiene un tiempito libre l e gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Seco de Pollo”, ya que le gusta mucho cocinar. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Maura logro comprarse una mototaxi, con la cual tiene su negocio de alquiler de mototaxi, asimismo tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y algunos abarrotes; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Maura está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar llantas y puertas para su mototaxi, con lo cual su vehículo estará más seguro y sobre todo habrá mayor seguridad para los pasajeros, de esta manera evitara que le coloquen multas y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener una gran tienda de ropa”.
texts.en:
Maura is 65 years old and lives in the city of Ica, a city that is characterized by its warm and friendly climate.  It is also known for tourist attractions such as lake Huacachina, which is situated in the midst of marvelous sand dunes where people enjoy adventure sports such as sand-boarding. The area is also known for its agriculture, especially for the cultivation of grapes, asparagus, beans and Lima beans.  

When she has a little bit of free time, she likes to cook and enjoy one of her favorite dishes “Seco de Pollo”, (a type of chicken stew).  As she has always had few financial resources, she only finished high school, but she would have liked to study to become a teacher.

With a great deal of effort and saving, Maura managed to buy herself a mototaxi, which she uses to transport passengers.  She also has a small business selling clothes and a variety of groceries.  She believes her businesses are going well because she is friendly to her customers, and above all because with the fruits of her labor she is able to meet her household expenses.

Maura is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to buy new tires and doors for her mototaxi.  This will make her vehicle more secure, and above all it will be safer for her passengers, and she will also avoid having to pay fines.   She will continue every day to make her greatest dream a reality: "to have a large clothing shop."

loans.use: to buy new tires and doors for her mototaxi.

loans.name: Mabel Roxana

texts.es: Mabel  Roxana de  26 años de edad,  soltera con un hijo menor de edad, tiene por actividad económica la elaboración y comercialización de artesanía, el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación  y por pedido,  el negocio consiste en elaborar productos de barro (jarrones, adornos de cocina, floreros, muñecos de trapos, gigantonas, juegos de adornos de sala, entre otros. El financiamiento lo necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo y  así incrementar  su negocio atreves de la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Mabel Roxana, 26, is single and has a minor son.  Her economic activity is making and selling crafts.  Her business is located at home and she also sells to order.  The business consists in manufacturing clay objects (jugs, kitchen decorations, vases, rag dolls, giant figures, and sets of living room decorations, among others).  She needs the loan to invest in working capital to increase her business and meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy crafts.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
Maria tiene 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se puede apreciar atractivos turísticos como la laguna de “Huacachina, la cual se ubica en medio de maravillosas dunas, en las cuales se practican deportes de aventura como el samboarding, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial se cultiva la uva, esparrago, pallares, frejoles, entre otros. Maria es madre de una pequeña, a la cual quiere y ama muchísimo y sobre todo trabaja muy duro para darle una vida digna y con mucho amor.

Maria es muy trabajadora, anteriormente laboraba en un negocio de lavado de autos como empleada de limpieza y después de mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta de comida y venta de bebidas gaseosas, desde hace ya 2 años; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque su mayor motivo de lucha es su pequeña a quien ama tanto.

Maria está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para poder conservar sus productos como carne, pollo, verduras y también podrá comprar mercadería como gaseosas para poder ofrecer a sus clientes, podrá conservar mejor sus productos y podrá seguir trabajando muy duro para poder hacer realidad  su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hija y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Maria is 21 years old. She lives in the town of Ica, a town which is known for its warm and cozy weather. Also, there are tourist attractions that can be appreciated, such as the Huacachina lagoon, which is located among gorgeous dunes where people practice adventure sports like sandboarding. In addition, there's the agricultural development, especially the growing of grapes, asparagus and lima beans, among others. Maria is the mother of a little girl whom she loves very much. Above all, she works very hard in order to give her a life that's dignified and full of love.
Maria is very hardworking. Previously, she worked for a carwash business as a cleaning worker. After working very hard and saving money, two years ago she succeeded in starting her own business of selling food and soft drinks. She believes that her business is doing well because she's very friendly to customers, and most of all because the greatest reason for her struggle is her little girl, whom she loves so much.
Maria is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she'll be able to purchase a refrigerator, so that she can store her products such as meat, chicken and vegetables. She'll also be able to purchase merchandise such as soft drinks to offer her customers. She'll be able to better store her products and to keep on working very hard in order to achieve her biggest dream: "Providing her daughter with a good education and being able to improve her living conditions".

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and soft drinks.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
El comité “Santa Lucía” esta en el quinto ciclo, tiene 18 integrantes. Todas las integrantes realizan actividades productivas, son muy emprendedoras y se ayudan mutuamente.
La sra. María Luz con su esfuerzo y dedicación anhela un futuro mejor para ella y la de su familia es por eso que día a día se esmera por vender mayores cantidades de bijouteries y satisfacer a su clientela con las variedades de aros, cadenitas, pulseras, etc.
Desea el crédito para la compra de insumos como: aros, collares, pulseras, etc.
texts.en:
The “Santa Lucía” committee is in its 5th cycle with 18 members. All the members carry out productive activities.  They are very enterprising and help each other out.

María Luz with effort and dedication hopes for a better future for her and her family which is why she strives day to day to sell larger amounts of costume jewelry and satisfy customer demand with a variety of hoops, chains, bracelets, etc.  She wants the loan to buy merchandise like hoop earrings, necklaces, bracelets, etc.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry.

loans.name: María Mercedes Elvia

texts.es: María Mecedes requiere su segundo crédito con KIVA, en el primero pudo incrementar su patrimonio y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos y su capacidad de pago. Esta vez requiere un crédito para poder mejorar su plantación. Desde que enviudó las cosas no han sido fáciles para ella sin embargo con los créditos que ha podido obtener ha logrado salir adelante. Con el dinero de este segundo crédito pagaré una parte de su crédito anterior y con lo que sobre comprará semilla y fertilizantes para mejorar su producción.
texts.en: María Mercedes needs a second Kiva loan.  With the first one she was able to increase her assets thus increasing income and payment capacity.  This time she needs a loan to improve her crops.  Since she was widowed things have not been easy for her.  However, with the loans she’s been able to get she’s managed to get ahead.  She will use the money from this second loan to pay part of her previous loan and will use what’s left over to buy seeds and fertilizer to improve production.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with seven children and six of her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major expenses include school fees and food.

Fatuma sells fresh fruit and vegetables at the market. She has been in this business for the last eight years. She also gets additional income from rearing poultry. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy more pineapples, watermelon, passion fruit and sweet bananas. Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonal fluctuations. Her goals and aspirations are to build rental houses and to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of watermelon, passion fruit and sweet bananas

loans.name: Jefri Rene

texts.es: Jefri, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en el municipio del Negrito, Yoro junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos. Jefri, trabajaba en la municipalidad de la comunidad y hace dos años que decidió establecer su propio negocio, el  brinda servicio de limpieza de áreas verdes, yardas y solares. su esposa trabaja en empresa privada y aporta al hogar. El decidió solicitar un préstamo para comprar otra maquina chapeadora, esta inversión va generar un empleo mas. Y espera generar otros ingresos que le ayuden a nivelarse económicamente con su familia. Su sueño es que sus hijos sigan estudiando y mantener o mejorar las condiciones alimenticias diarias de su familia.
texts.en:
Jefri is 35, and lives with his wife and their two children in the municipality of Negrito, in Yoro department. Jefri used to work for the local municipality, and two years ago decided to set up his own business. 

He offers a service clearing green areas such as yards and lots. His wife works at a private company and contributes to the household.

He decided to apply for a loan in order to buy another grass trimmer. This investment is going to create one more job, and he hopes to generate other income that will help him and his family achieve financial stability. 

His dream is for his children to keep going to school, and to maintain or improve his family's daily diet.

loans.use: To buy a grass trimmer for clearing, and for maintenance of yards and lots.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar es un hombre de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Camaná con su esposa y su pequeño bebé recién nacido, él es muy trabajador, alegre y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias al apoyo de sus padres pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Computación, en sus ratos libres le gusta pescar y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Saltado de Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposa, con mucho empeño y dedicación Edgar puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de alquiler de cabinas de internet, diariamente desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él dedica a su  negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.
Edgar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que él dese poder realizar el techado de su negocio con calaminas; de esta manera Edgar tendrá su negocio en buenas condiciones, así el espera poder incrementar sus servicios y  ganancias para poder brindar mayor bienestar y seguridad para su familia.
texts.en:
Edgar, 21, is a man living in the city of Camaná with his wife and newborn baby.  He’s very hardworking, cheerful and enthusiastic.  He focuses all his efforts into moving his family forward.  Thanks to support from his parents he was able to study computer programming.  In his free time he likes to go fishing and sometimes cooks a delicious “Saltado de Pollo” to share with his family.

Thanks to support from his wife and with much effort and dedication, Edgar launched his small business renting out Internet access booths.  He starts work very early in the morning every day and spends about 12 hours daily at work.  He believes he does well because of the kind, respectful way he treats his customers.

Edgar is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to make some home improvements.  He wants to install a plywood roof in the business in order to have better conditions.  He hopes thus to increase services and profits to provide greater wellbeing and security for his family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Mehriddin

texts.en:
Mehriddin is 26 years old. He is an industrious man with a great desire to be the richest businessman in his town! He is married to a lovely woman. They have two children they love very much and try to comfort with all the modern conveniences. 

Mehriddin sells a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, carrots, onions, etc. He sells his goods in a local market. He began working this way over nine years ago because he needed to earn money. His father helps him to purchase his merchandise. They want to develop the business further in order to provide their family with a better standard of living.

This is Mehriddin's fifth loan with Imon International, and he is grateful for the financial support to help him to realize his plans. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Gladys Roxana

texts.es:
Gladys es una mujer de 34 años, es soltera, vive con sus abuelos en la ciudad de Ica, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, con un gran deseo de superación; gracias al apoyo de sus abuelos quienes han sido como sus padres, pudo estudiar la carrera de diseño grafico, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo culminarlos, pero sueña con poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura.
Gracias al apoyo de sus abuelos, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo Gladys puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de artículos de librería, fotocopias y recargas virtuales, ella trabaja diariamente y dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y respetuoso que brinda a sus clientes.
Gladys se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como folders, lapiceros, hojas, cuadernos y otros útiles de escritorios diversos; de esta manera Gladys tendrá su negocio abastecido, con ello espera poder incrementar sus ventas e ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco irá ahorrando para retomar sus estudios y así también mejorar la calidad de vida de sus abuelos.
texts.en:
Gladys is a 34 year old woman, and she is single.  She lives with her grandparents in the city of Ica.  She is a very amiable, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to improve herself.  Thanks to the support of her grandparents, who have been like her parents, she was able to study graphic design.  Sadly, due to lack of financial resources, she was unable to complete her studies.  She dreams of being able to do so.  In her free time she likes to spend a little time reading.

Thanks to the support of her grandparents, and with great determination and enthusiasm, Gladys started her small business of selling bookstore items, photocopies, and cell phone minutes.  She works every day at her business for approximately ten hours.  She is happy with the work she does.  She believes that it is going well for her because of the amiable and respectful service that she offers her customers.

Gladys is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help given to her she will be able to buy merchandise like folders, pens, sheets of paper, notebooks, and other diverse desk supplies.  This way Gladys will have her business stocked.  With this she hopes to be able to increase her sales and her income.  She will be saving little by little to resume her studies, and that way she will also improve her grandparents’ quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like folders, pens, sheets of paper, notebooks, and other diverse desk supplies.

loans.name: Sukarman

texts.en:
Sukarman is only a temporary worker who does not have a regular job. His income depends on whether or not there are any construction projects. His wife tries to help raise funds by selling “mendoan” (a type of soybean cake) on the side of the road. Because of limited economic circumstances, Sukarman is applying for a loan through Kiva's Student Loan program for the future of his child, Agung.

Agung has just graduated from junior high and he wants to learn more at a vocational school. Despite having a situation like this, Agung steeled himself to continue his studies so he can at least graduate from vocational school, after which he can get a job to help his parents and younger siblings. In the picture are Agung and Sukarman, his father.

loans.use: To pay education fees at a vocational school

loans.name: Jazmin Pamela

texts.es:
Jazmin es una joven de 19 años, es soltera,  vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Ica en el distrito de Santiago, a pesar de su corta edad ella es una joven muy trabajadora y entusiasta, con un gran deseo de superación, con mucho empeño culmino sus estudios secundarios satisfactoriamente, ahora ella sueña en convertirse en una gran profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Jazmin trabaja como asistente administrativo en una empresa de servicios de su ciudad, ella labora un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y se siente a gusto realizando su labor, ella cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jazmin se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de estudios, tales como pago de matrícula, primera mensualidad y materiales de estudios; de esta manera Jazmin podrá dar inicio a estudios profesionales de Administración de Empresas, así ella espera poder cursar sus estudios y poco a poco convertirse en una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Jazmin is a young woman who's 19 years old. She's single and lives with her parents and siblings in the town of Ica, in the district of Santiago. Despite her young age, she's a very hardworking and enthusiastic young woman with a lot of drive to succeed. With a lot of effort, she successfully completed her high school studies and now she dreams of becoming a great professional. In her free time, she enjoys taking some time to read.
With a lot of hard work and dedication, Jazmin works everyday as an administrative assistant for a service business of her town. She works approximately 10 hours a day and is pleased to do her job. She believes that she does well because of her good performance and her friendliness towards others.
Jazmin is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she'll be able to pay for her study expenses, such as the tuition fee, the first monthly school fee and the learning materials. That way Jazmin will be able to begin studying for a career in business administration. She hopes to be able to complete her studies and to gradually become a great professional.

loans.use: to pay for her study expenses.

loans.name: Eugenia Petronila

texts.es:
La señora Eugenia Petronila esta casada, tiene 46 años de edad, cursó el tercer grado de educación básica, tiene 5 hijos 4 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la atención de taller de mantenimiento de bicicletas y motos, inicio este negocio por propia iniciativa y hasta el momento lleva 23 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo taller de reparación de motos y bicicletas.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para motos y bicicletas: llantas, tubos, aros, parches, adhesivos, pinturas, etc. En el futuro espera mejora y tener un negocio de venta de bicicletas.
texts.en:
Eugenia Petronila is 46 years old, and married. She went as far as third grade of primary school and has five children, four of whom are going to school. 

She operates a bicycle and motorcycle repair shop. She started this business through her own initiative and has 23 years of experience so far. She has the help of her husband, who works in the same bicycle and motorcycle repair shop.

She is requesting a loan to puchase spare parts for motorcycles and bicycles, such as tires, inner tubes, rims, patches, glues and paints, etc.

She hopes for improvement in the future, and to have a business selling bicycles.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her workshop.

loans.name: Agus

texts.en:
Agus is a seasonal laborer forced to depend on odd job and an uncertain income. His wife decided to go to Jakarta to help the family. However, one year has passed and Agus cannot reach her at all. Agus thinks she could not accept the economic conditions of the family, so she decided to leave her family. Agus wants his daughter Anisa to go to school. Agus is applying for a Student Loan from Kiva. 

Anisa is one of two sisters. Anisa knows she has become a big burden for her father but she wants to stay in school, Anisa want to pass and have a good job to make father and sister happy. In the picture are Anisa and Agus, her father.

loans.use: To pay education fees at a vocational school

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth con su credikiva financió su cartera y otorgó un mayor número de créditos a sus clientes, ella pudo dar respuesta a sus pedidos y hoy se siente muy satisfecha de haberlo logrado. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará productos de belleza, de los cuales tiene un buen número de pedidos de nuevos y rentables clientes. Ella dice a sus financiadores de Kiva  que está muy agradecida por el apoyo económico que le están brindando y espera seguir prosperando con los préstamos.
texts.en:
With her credikiva loan, Ruth financed her sales portfolio and extended additional credit to her customers. She was able to respond to her orders, and today feels very satisfied to have achieved this. 

Currently, she is applying for a new credikiva loan to buy beauty products, for which she has a good number of new orders and paying customers. To her Kiva lenders, she says that she is very grateful for the financial support they are providing her, and that she hopes to continue prospering with the help of the loans.

loans.use: To buy beauty products in greater volume.

loans.name: Octavio Victor

texts.es:
Octavio vive en la calurosa ciudad de Nazca, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido en cualquier época del año, asimismo tiene muchos atractivos turísticos, entre ellos podemos encontrar las líneas de Nazca, las cuales son jeroglíficos ubicados en medio de un extenso campo árido, el cual según algunos estudios era utilizado como calendario astronómicos, especialmente para saber cuando era la temporada de lluvias. Octavio en su tiempo libre aprovecha para poder leer ya que lo distrae mucho y sobre todo en ocasiones aprovecha la oportunidad para poder comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Octavio solo estudio hasta el tercer grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado poder terminar la escuela.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta de churros, empanadas de queso, entre otros, el trabaja alrededor d e4 horas diarias, ofrece sus productos a las afueras de su humilde vivienda y con los ingresos de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene  una buena sazón para la preparación de sus productos y sobre todo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo carismático.

Octavio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá  terminar de construir su pequeña vivienda, de material noble ya que esta era de material de adobe, con esta mejora podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo porque podrá seguir esforzándose por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una vivienda bien construida”.
texts.en:
Octabio lives in the warm city of Nazca, a city known for having a very hot climate no matter what the time of year. As well it has many tourist attractions, among which are the Nazca Lines, a series of ancient hieroglyphs located in the middle of an extensive arid field. According to several studies they were used as an astronomical calendar, especially to determine when the rainy season would appear. 

Octavio takes advantage of his spare time to read because it takes his mind off things and occasionally he also makes use of such opportunities to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Arroz con pollo”. Due to his scarce financial resources, Octavio only studied until the third year of secondary school but he would have liked to have finished school. 

Through much effort and saving, he succeeded in starting his business selling fritters and cheese empanadas, among other items. He works about 4 hours a day and sells his products outside of his modest dwelling. With the income from his work he is able to pay his household expenses.  He believes he is doing well in his business because the foods he prepares are flavorable and above all because he is friendly to his customers and charismatic.

Octavia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help that they have provided him, he will be able to finish building his small house with superior material because what he had was adobe. Thus he will be able to improve it and have a better quality of life and above all he will be able to continue working hard to make his greatest dream a reality: “To have a well built residence.”

loans.use: to finish building his residence.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Due to the hardship of living, Adelaida engages in selling dry goods in the public market. She is 52 years old and has two grown-up children. She and her husband aim to improve their status of living to give their children a better life. 

She has been operating the business for almost two years and she usually earns a profit of PHP 9,000 a month that she usually spends for their food, clothing, and allowances of her children. At this time, she aims to earn and save more income to satisfy their necessities and save some for their future. 

To strengthen the business, she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy additional stock of blouses, pants, polo shirts, jackets, jogging pants, long sleeved shirts, and skirts for sale. She believes that this loan will help her to improve the business as she continues to work hard for it.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of blouses, pants, polo shirts, jackets, jogging pants, long sleeved shirts, and skirts for sale.

location.town: Brgy. Villa Coloma, Bagabag, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en: Thomas is 35 years old and hardworking. To earn a living, he runs a motorcycle transport business in a competitive environment with reliable customers. Previously, he used to operate a grocery shop. Through the training he received, he has learnt how to save and manage his business. He dreams of expanding his business. He has requested a loan of 15,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Sunarto

texts.en:
Sunarto works as a laborer/brick maker with revenues of less than three USD a day. On rainy days, Sunarto cannot earn any money, because Sunarto must stop making bricks. His wife died and left him with three-year-old twins: Anjarsari and Anjaswati. Sunarto must work alone to meet their daily needs. Student loans from Kiva help him help Anjarsari to finish school.

Anjarsari has a twin sister named Anjaswati, and three other siblings. Now, Anjarsari just graduated from junior high school and wants to go to vocational school so she can achieve her goal as a clothes designer. She is very grateful to Kiva for the Student Loan program and hopefully she can finish school. In the picture are Anjarsari and Sunarto, her father.

loans.use: To pay education fees at a vocational school

loans.name: Ruth Elena

texts.es: Ruth con su crédito anterior compró víveres, ranchos con los que incrementó su inventario y vendió mucho más. Esto la tiene muy satisfecha, porque con sus compras logró descuentos especiales que aumentaron sus utilidades. Ahora se prepara para invertir nuevamente y está aplicando a un credikiva, inversión que planea será exitosa porque conoce los hábitos de compra de su clientela y  la mercancía que rota con más frecuencia como víveres, refrescos y ranchos. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Estoy muy agradecida por el apoyo que me han brindado, porque me  ha  permitido obtener mayores ingresos para mi negocio y mi familia.
texts.en: With her previous loan, Ruth bought grocery items and meat with which she expanded her business and sold a great deal more. This has satisfied her greatly, because she was able to get special discounts on her purchases which increased her profits. She is now getting ready to invest again, and she is applying for a Kiva loan. Her planned investment will be successful because she knows her customers' buying habits and which products she sells most, such as grocery items, pop, and meats. She has the following message for Kiva lenders: "I am very grateful for the support that you have offered me, because it has allowed me to obtain a greater income for my business and my family."

loans.use: to buy pop, grocery items, and meats.

loans.name: Asep

texts.en:
Asep’s family's economic condition is far from good. Asep is a temporary laborer whose income depends on whether or not there is a job. His wife works as a maid for an employer who lives away from home to help the family situation. Asep and his wife's income is only sufficient to meet basic daily needs. For school fees for Lia, Asep applied for a loan from Kiva through the Student Loan program.

Lia is concerned about the condition of her parents. She is concerned she will not finish school. She expects with a huge program like the Student Loan from Kiva, she can finish school, help her family and and achevie her goals as a clothes designer.  In the picture are Lia and Asep, her father.

loans.use: To pay education fees at a vocational school

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.en:
Teofilo is a farmer from Dalaoig. He is 36 years old and ha two young children attending elementary school. His wife is a housekeeper and rice farming is the only viable source of his income. 

He would like to improve his farming practices and produce an abundant harvest. That is why he is borrowing a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

In the future, Teofilo would like to keep improving his crop production for the betterment of his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Allen Joy

texts.en:
Allen Joy dreams that someday she will be successful and financially stable. She is 23 years old and married but has no children yet. They live in a rural community where they can plant and harvest rice, vegetables and root crops for sale. 

To have another source of income, Allen Joy engages in buying and selling of fish in the public market. Being kind and friendly to others, she can win more friends who become customers of her business. For this reason, she aims to continue to strengthen the business to increase her income. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of 20,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) to buy additional fish, meat and frozen foods to sell. 

Although she has competitors in the area, through patience and hard work, she believes that she can sell more of her products and improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fish, meat and frozen foods to sell

location.town: Brgy. Inaban, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 36 years old and married with one child. She does tailoring to earn a living. She has engaged in this business for six years and has employed one person. Besides, she does farming and also runs a motorcycle transport business to generate more income. 

Elizabeth had acquired several loans from Faulu Kenya which helped her to grow her business. She dreams of operating another outlet in a different location in the future. 

She has requested a loan of 80,000 KES to buy fabrics for tailoring.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for tailoring.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy is 48 years old, married, and has three children. She operates a spare parts shop to earn a living. She has been in business for four years and has one employee. Besides that, she generates extra income from her rental houses. Since she became a client of Faulu Kenya, she has learnt how to save because she has been trained in financial management. She dreams of expanding her business and operating a filling station. Lucy has requested a loan of 30,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to buy oil lubricants for sale.

loans.use: To buy oil lubricants

loans.name: Kleber Geovanny

texts.es:
Kleber es un hombre soltero de 21 años que vive en Quinindé, provincia de esmeraldas. Quinindé es un municipio pequeño ubicado en la costa ecuatoriana. El clima de Quinindé es tropical lluvioso, y cuenta con dos estaciones: seca y lluviosa. Inicialmente a Quinindé solo se podía llegar a través de vías fluviales a través de ríos, recién a finales de los años sesenta se construyó la carretera que une Quito y Esmeraldas que pasa por Quinindé. El municipio de Quinindé se sustenta principalmente a través de la agricultura y la ganadería.
De este pequeño lugar viene Kleber, el sólo alcanzo a terminar la secundaria y pasó inmediatamente a preocuparse de su negocio el cual abrió hace poco más de 5 años. Kleber tiene una pequeña mecánica, y está solicitando su primer crédito. Por lo general Kleber trabaja en las tardes y todo el día los fines de semana, ahora ya ha llegado el momento en el cual puede expandir su capacidad lo que le traería mayores ingresos, Kleber está solicitando este préstamo para comprar repuestos y en si usar el dinero como capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Kleber is a single man, 21 years old, who lives in Quinindé, in Esmeraldas Province. Quinindé is a small town located on the Ecuadorean coast. The weather in Qinindé is tropical and rainy and there are two seasons: dry and rainy. Initially Quinindé was only accessible through waterways and by rivers. Recently, at the end of the 1970’s, a highway was built that connected Quito and Esmeraldas, which passes through Quinindé. The town of Quinindé is sustained principally through farming and livestock raising.

Kleber lives in this small place. He only finished secondary school and then went immediately to work in his business which he started a little over 5 years ago. He has a small mechanic’s shop and is requesting his first loan. Generally Kleber works afternoons and all day during the weekends. Now the time has come for him to enlarge his capacity, which would bring in greater earnings. Kleber is requesting this loan to purchase spare parts and to use the money as working capital.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and have working capital.

loans.name: Gasan

texts.en:
Gasan is 61 years old. He lives in a small village of the Gardabani District with his wife Minaia, their 35-year-old son, their daughter-in-law, and two little grandchildren. His son is a worker in a private company and gets a monthly salary. Gasan runs an agricultural business. He has leased land, where he grows broom. He sells broom in nearby villages. Gasan has the tractor and other agricultural techniques. He offers agricultural service to local farmers by his own tractor and gets service fee for the work. 

Gasan requested a loan for purchasing a milk cow. He will produce cheese and sell it in nearby villages. He wants to expand his agricultural business. With increased income he will be able to reinvest in his agricultural business to expand it and make it more profitable. Because of this, the living conditions of his family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase milking cows

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras De Tacumbu Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Emprendedoras de Tacumbu” tiene más de tres años trabajando con la Fundación, tiene 20 integrantes, todas ellas realizan actividades productivas en busca de un mejor porvenir.
La sra. Ubaldina es muy emprendedora, lucha todos los días por seguir acrecentando sus ingresos y clientela, se dedica a su despensa y a la venta de ropas nuevas y usadas.
Solicito el crédito para la compra de vestidos, polleras, vaqueros, remeras, verduras, frutas, leches, carnes, huevos, etc.
texts.en:
The committee "Entrepreneur Women of Tacumbu" has more than three years working with Fundación. It has 20 members, all of them engaged in productive activities looking for a better future.

Ubaldina is very entrepreneurial, she works hard every day to keep increasing her income and customer base. She runs a store and sells new and used clothes. She requested the loan to buy dresses, skirts, jeans, t-shirts, vegetables, fruits, lotions, meat, eggs, etc.

loans.use: to buy dresses, jeans, t-shirts, oils, lotions, fruits, vegetables, bread, etc.

loans.name: Hermocilla

texts.en:
Hermocilla is 61 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with seven children. 

Hermocilla is providing motorela or motorcycle services with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for eight years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

Hermocilla has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline.

loans.name: Julie

texts.es: Julie de 27 años de edad es una mujer casada y madre de dos hijos en las edades de 6 y 2 años, con los que sueña ver convertido en profesionales de bien y exitosos; por eso para complementar los ingresos familiares y  lograr aumentar su bienestar, decidió generar ingresos, iniciando desde el año 2009 su propia aventura de negocios, ofreciendo servicios de fotocopiaje, internet, impresiones, transcripciones y  telefonía celular.  En su negocio los principales clientes son jóvenes estudiantes y la población infantil acompañada de sus padres, que están en la búsqueda de resolver tareas escolares y para eso acuden al negocio de Julie que diariamente abre al público sus instalaciones, desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Con su negocio le ha ido muy bien y proyecta su crecimiento, pues tiene como meta mejorar su infraestructura locativa, y adquirir mas adelante su casa propia. En la actualidad su mayor desafío es tener un capital de trabajo suficiente, para comprar en mayor volumen, tonel, hojas y hacer mantenimiento preventivo a todo el equipamiento. Con su credikiva, segundo finaciamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  logrará invertir y ganar descuentos por compras en mayor volumen y sostener un stock, muy útil para el crecimiento de su clientela que está en progreso. Julie tiene el propósito de aumentar los ingresos y desde ya, con sus credikiva está muy segura de empezar el camino al asenso del logro de sus expectativas
texts.en:
Julie is 27 years old, married and the mother of two children of 6 and 2 years old, who she dreams of becoming successful professionals. For this reason to complement the family income and improve their well-being, she has been running her own business since 2009, offering a photocopying, internet, printing, transcription and mobile phone service. The main customers of her business are young students and children accompanied by their parents, who are looking to complete homework and for this reason they visit Julie's business, which she opens daily to the public from 7 in the morning until 9 at night. 

Her business has gone very well for her and she plans to expand it. One of her goals is to improve the place she is renting, and later on to obtain her own premises. At the moment her biggest challenge is to have sufficient working capital, so as to buy toner and paper in greater volume and to undertake precautionary maintenance on all the computers. With her Kiva loan, her second loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, she will buy stock in bulk and at a discounted price, very useful for the growth of her customer base which is increasing. 

Julie has the goal of increasing her income and with her Kiva loan she is sure she will start moving upwards towards meeting her expectations.

loans.use: to buy toner and paper in larger volume.

loans.name: Marcos Enso

texts.es:
Enso en un joven de 21 años de edad, el vive en al ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, también encontramos playas hermosas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, sus pobladores poseen una habilidad para la preparación de platillos ya que su comida es deliciosa y sobre todo tienen una alegría muy contagiante. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Enso le gusta mucho escuchar música y sobre todo leer, también le gusta comer en algunas ocasiones uno de su paltillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pato con papa a la huancaína. 

Día a día Enso trabaja muy duro para poder salir adelante, el trabaja como costurero en una empresa textil de su ciudad, trabaja alrededor e 9 horas al  día, ya que por la noches estudia la carrera de educación; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Enso está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoramientos en su vivienda como refacción de las paredes ya que se encuentran agrietadas ya que son de adobe; de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y podrá seguir luchando cada dia para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”
texts.en:
Enso is a young man who's 21 years old. He lives in the town of Chincha, a town known for having a warm and cozy weather. Also, there are beautiful beaches, and it's the birthplace of glorious names in Peruvian sports. Its inhabitants are skilled at cooking, because their food is delicious, and above all they display a cheerfulness that's very contagious. When he gets free time, Enso very much enjoys listening to music and especially reading. Occasionally, he also likes to eat one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious rice with duck and "papas a la Huancaína" (Huancayo-style potatoes).
Enso works very hard on a daily basis in order to get ahead. He works as a stitcher for a textile company of his town. He works about 9 hours a day, since at night he studies for a career in education. He believes that he does well in his work because he's very responsible and because he has a lot of drive to get ahead.
Enso is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he'll be able to do home improvements, such as renovating the walls that are cracked because they're made of adobe. That way he'll be able to improve his living conditions and to keep on striving everyday in order to make his greatest dreams come true.

loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Carmen

texts.es: Elizabeth de 46 años de edad,  vive en el municipio de Soledad  con su esposa  y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 14 a 21, que son su mayor motor en la vida y por ellos su esposo y ella trabajan persistentemente,  para lograr que tengan un futuro con mucho bienestar. Elizabeth tiene un negocio mediante el cual vende ranchos, víveres, refrescos y bebidas; ella  recogió toda su experiencia de joven, cuando  trabajó ayudando a sus padres en la tienda familiar y la tradujo en su propia forma de generar ingresos independientes y lo hizo también para poder atender su hogar simultáneamente  y con el apoyo de su esposo,  quien también conocía de esta actividad por experiencia propia y quien dispuso emprenderla en su propia casa ubicada en otro barrio de la ciudad; allí obtuvieron buenos resultados y gradualmente han progresado, pues se trasladaron a otro lugar,  donde les fue mucho mejor,  logrando ahorros con los cuales compraron su vivienda y adquirieron 2 lotes,  donde construirán dos apartamentos, porque desean seguir estructurando un capital, para tener una vejez digna y educar a sus hijos con una estructura de calidad. Elizabeth ha recibido 13 financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo durante 16 años, que han servido de apoyo al crecimiento de su capital de trabajo. Su meta es lograr  construir sus 2 lotes y con ello generar mas ingresos para seguir fortaleciendo el bienestar de su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará víveres, ranchos, refrescos y licores aumentando así una vez mas sus inventarios, ya que haciendo una exhibición acorde a las necesidades de sus clientela impacta cada vez mas sus ventas y esto si que es su éxito.
texts.en: Elizabeth, age 46, lives in the municipality of Soledad with her husband. She has three children ages 14-21. They are the driving force in her life; it is for them that she and her husband work persistently, in order to be able to provide them with a good future. Elizabeth has a business where she sells meat, grocery items, pop, and drinks. She gained her experience in the area as a young woman, working with her parents and helping them out in the family store. She used this knowledge to generate her own, independent income while still being able to keep house. She has done this with her husband's support; he also knew this business from his own experiences. He decided to open the business in their home in another neighbourhood in the city. They had good results there, and gradually progressed. Later they moved to another location where things went much better for them. They were able to save up and buy their home and two lots where they built two apartments because they wanted to keep building capital in order to live a dignified old age and give their children a quality education. Elizabeth has taken out 13 loans from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo over 16 years. These loans have been a support to her in expanding her working capital. Her goal is to be able to build on their two lots and generate more income in order to keep strengthening their family's position. She is currently applying for a Kiva loan with which she will buy grocery items, meat, pop and liquor. This will increase her inventory yet again. Having inventory that corresponds with her clients' needs always impacts her sales; this is why she is successful.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, meat, pop, and liquor.

loans.name: Moises Erasmo

texts.es:
Moisés es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, a quienes ama y son su razón principal para salir adelante; él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, con muchos deseos de superación; lamentablemente Moisés no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Res para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho y entusiasmo, Moisés se dedica a la agricultura, él cuenta con un pequeño terreno donde cultiva pallar y papa, desde tempranas horas de la mañana él inicia sus labores de campo dedicando un aproximado de 10 horas diarias a su negocio, Moisés se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su dedicación. 
Moisés se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de fertilizantes y pesticidas para su cultivo, de esta manera él podrá abonar y alejar las plagas de su cosecha, así Moisés espera que su cultivo se desarrolle adecuadamente y con ello desea poder venderlo y conseguir ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco irá ahorrando para poder asegurar la educación y bienestar de sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Moisés is a 44-year-old man. He lives in the town of Nazca with his wife and two children, whom he loves; they're his main reason for getting ahead. He's a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person with a lot of drive to succeed. Unfortunately, Moisés couldn't study for a professional career, but he would have liked to have studied for a career in business administration. In his free time, he enjoys taking a little time to read. On some occasions, he cooks a delicious "seco de res" (cilantro beef stew) that he shares with his family.
On his own initiative, and with a lot of enthusiasm, Moisés works in agriculture. He owns a small plot of land where he grows lima beans and potatoes. He starts working on the land from the early hours of the morning. He works an average of 10 hours a day on his business. Moisés feels good doing his work, and he believes that he does well because of his dedication.
Moisés is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he'll be able to purchse fertilizer and pesticide for his crop. That way he'll be able to remove the pests and fertilize his crop. Moisés hopes that by doing that, his crop will grow properly. He wishes to sell it and get profits that he'll gradually save in order to ensure his children's education and well-being.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticide for his crop.

loans.name: Cenira Rosa

texts.es:
Cenira de 50 años de edad,  es propietaria de una confección donde fabrica ajuares para bebé, ropa femenina  y artículos de lencería. Ella es casada y con sus 23 años de experiencia, ha logrado aportarle a su unidad familiar ingresos, para apoyar en compañía de su esposo el bienestar de su familia. 
Ella abandonó sus estudios y se dedicó al aprendizaje del arte de la confección, iniciando con ropas sobre medidas que elaboraba para un pequeño grupo de vecinas, familiares y amigas, quienes se constituyeron en su principal mercado. En su negocio desarrolla todo el proceso productivo desde la compra de materias primas, el diseño, corte, la preparación, ensamble y acabado de piezas. Sus ventas las realiza directamente al consumidor final, a quienes les vende de contado y a crédito para recuperar su inversión en plazos semanales. Su meta de crecimiento y ensanche no decae y esta es la razón de invertirle capital de crédito a su negocio, para ampliar sus posibilidades de compras al por mayor, conseguir descuentos especiales en las materias primas responder mas oportunamente a su clientela y ganar aun mas su fidelidad. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual invertirá en  telas para elaborar ajuares de bebes y para fabricar vestidos femeninos que ha encargado su clientela.
texts.en:
Cenira is 50, and is the proprietor of a dressmaking business where she makes baby outfits, women's clothing and lingerie. She is married, and with her 23 years of experience has managed to contribute income to her household, in order to support, along with her husband, her family's well-being.  

She left school and devoted herself to learning the art of dressmaking, starting with made-to-measure clothing that she made for a small group of neighbors and friends who constituted her main market. 

In her business, she carries out the entire productive process: from the purchase of raw materials to design, cutting, sewing, assembly and finishing of pieces. 

She carries out her sales directly to the final consumer, to whom she sells for cash as well as on credit, recovering her investment in weekly installments. 

Her goal of growth and expansion is not flagging and this is her reason for investing loan capital in her business. This is so that she can expand her capacity to buy at wholesale and get special discounts on raw materials, and respond more opportunely to her customers and win their loyalty even more.

This is the reason why she is turning to a credikiva loan, her first from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will invest in fabric for making baby outfits and for making dresses that her customers have ordered.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials at wholesale and with special discounts.

loans.name: Ovilla

texts.en:
This is Ovilla, 37, a resident of GMA, Philippines. She is married to Isagani, a driver, and she is the mother of 5 children. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business.

Ovilla operates a vegetable stand. She sells different kinds of vegetables. Her store is just next to her house. Aside from vegetables, she also sells some groceries.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 200 in sales every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 13,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more vegetables and some groceries to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Ovilla dreams to be able to give her children a high-quality education through all her hard work on her business. She also hopes to have her house renovated by the end of the year. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for vegetables and other products needed in her business

loans.name: Cintya Leonor

texts.es:
Cintya es una mujer de 25 años, se encuentra felizmente casada, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 8 años, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder cursar la carrera de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Gracias al apoyo de su Madres, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 2 años Cintya puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella asiste al mercado central de su ciudad para realizar sus ventas y dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien debido a su buena atención.
Cintya se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: chompas, poleras, casacas, pantalones, polos, entre otras prendas; de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor abasteció y así espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales en un futuro no muy lejano utilizará para poder adquirir un local propio para su negocio.
texts.en:
Cintya is a 25 years old woman, is happily married, and lives in the city of Pisco with her husband and her young son who is 8 years old. She is a very kind person, hardworking and enthusiastic. 

With her partner, they dedicate all their effort to get ahead. Unfortunately, due to the need to work and support her expenses, she couldn´t pursue a career, but she would have liked to pursue the career of Business Administration. In her spare time, she likes to play sports and sometimes she cooks delicious rice with duck to share with her family.

With the support of her mother, with much effort and dedication, Cintya started her small business two years ago. She sells clothes for women, men, and children. Every day from the early morning she goes to the central market of her city to sell, working in her business approximately 12 hours a day. She feels comfortable doing her job and believe that is doing well because she has good customer care.  

Cintya is very grateful to kiva lenders, and thanks to the help she will buy merchandise such as sweaters, shirts, jackets, pants, polos, and other items. Doing so, she will have her business better stocked and she expects to increase her sales and her income, which in a not too distant future she will use to buy her own place for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sweaters, shirts, jackets, pants, polos, etc.

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea was photographed in front of her house, which is situated in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province. She is 55 years old and a widowed mother of six children. Three of her children are already married, and the others are employed as garment workers in Phnom Penh. Every month they usually send a remittance to support their mother financially. However, Chea does not rely totally on her children, because she also farms her plot of land. 

Chea would like to improve her farming business and ensure an abundant harvest in the coming season. That is why she is seeking a loan from HKL and Kiva to buy bean seeds and other farm supplies she needs for her crop. She is very happy about getting this loan because it will have a positive impact on her business as well as her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and other farm supplies needed to produce a good harvest.

loans.name: Roufai

texts.fr: Roufai a 24 ans, il est père d'un jeune enfant âgé de 03ans. Sa femme est revendeuse. Il exerce également depuis 3 ans la profession de revendeur. Il vend des télévisions, des amplis et toutes sortes d'accessoires techniques. Roufai a besoin d'un capital initial important pour pouvoir assurer ses ventes. C'est pour cela il engage aujourd'hui un deuxième prêt chez WAGES. Il compte utiliser ses futurs profits pour réinvestir dans son entreprise. Il espère ouvrir plus tard une deuxième boutique mais sa priorité reste de subvenir aux besoins en santé de sa famille.
texts.en: Roufai is 24 years old and the father of a young child, aged 3. His wife is a retailer. He has also been a retailer by trade for three years. He sells televisions, amplifiers, and all sorts of tech accessories. Roufai has need of starting capital to be able to ensure his sales. This is why he is now taking on a second loan with the microfinance institution WAGES. He intends to use his future profits to reinvest in his enterprise. He hopes to open a second shop later on, but his priority is still to meet his family's needs for health care.

loans.use: to buy televisions, amplifiers, bulbs, fans, etc.

loans.name: Yawogan

texts.fr: Yawogan est un jeune vendeur de vêtements. Il a commencé cette année son activité. Il possède une boutique où il vend des pantalons et des chemises. Yawogan a des difficultés dans ses ventes car la diversité de son stock est insuffisante. C'est dans le but de l'augmenter qu'il sollicite un crédit chez Wages. Il a pour projet de réinvestir ses profits dans son entreprise. Il aimerait pour plus tard développer son activité de manière à pouvoir ouvrir une autre boutique pour sa future femme.
texts.en: Yawogan is a young clothing seller. He started this business this year. He has a shop where he sells pants and shirts. Yawogan has some problems in his sales because the diversity in his inventory is inadequate. With the goal of increasing it, he is requesting a loan from the microfinance institution WAGES. His plans include reinvesting his profits into his enterprise. Later on, he would like to develop his business, so as to be able to open another shop for his future wife.

loans.use: to buy bales of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Yonnis Alberto

texts.es: Yonnis de 38 años de edad es el propietario de una tienda ubicada al sur occidente de la ciudad, donde vive con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 6 a 17 años. El tiene 4 años de experiencia en tiendas, pero solo hasta el año 2010 inició su propia aventura,  invirtiendo poco a poco  y generando cada día más ingresos. El inicialmente vendía productos traídos desde un país fronterizo que distribuía entre muchos negocios y familias de su alrededor. En la actualidad emprendió su punto comercial, donde vende con una frecuencia diaria, víveres en cantidades ajustadas a lo que puede pagar su clientela, haciendo del detalle un buen ejercicio comercial. El compra en los depósitos de ranchos, víveres y carnes, y los vende  en su local. Estos artículos son los que mas rotan en su local y vende el 80% de contado y el 20% a crédito, en los horarios de 6 de la mañana a 10 de la noche y desde lunes a domingo; sus principales clientes son sus vecinos en el barrio, especialmente mujeres, quienes diariamente llevan a su casa la compra del día, realizada en la tienda de Yonnis, para elaborar las comidas que preparan a sus familias. Su meta es la de incrementar sus ventas, pero su mayor desafío, es tener el capital de trabajo suficiente para lograrlo, esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor volumen,víveres, refrescos, licores y ranchos, para ganar descuentos y disminuir los costos de transporte, por que la frecuencia diaria que hasta hoy viene aplicando, hace que los gastos sean superiores a si hoy con su credikiva, compra en mayor volumen y disminuye la frecuencia de compra y esto es lo que hace que esta inversión sea de mayor éxito.
texts.en:
Yonnis is 38 years old and owns a store located south west of the city, where he lives with his wife and their 3 children, ages 6 through 17. He has 4 years experience in running stores but it was just in 2010 that he began his own store, investing little by little and generating more income each day. Initially, he sold products brought from a neighboring country which he distributed among many businesses and families in the surrounding areas.

At present, Yonnis is beginning to sell groceries daily in quantities adjusted to what his clientele can pay, creating a good commercial opportunity. He purchases groceries and meats from the storehouses of ranches, and sells them in his store. These articles are the items most in demand in his store. He sells 80 % for cash and 20 % for credit, between the hours of 6:00 am and 10:00 pm, Monday through Sunday.  His principal customers are residents of the barrio, especially women, who daily carry home the purchases of the day, obtained from Yonnis' store, to prepare meals for their families.

Yonnis' goal is to increase sales, but his major challenge is to obtain sufficient working capital to achieve that. That is why he is presently applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, to purchase a larger volume of groceries, soft drinks, liquors, and meals, in order to obtain discounts and diminish transportation costs. The frequency with which, until recently, he has been forced to make purchases, made his expenses higher. With this Kiva loan, he will buy in larger volume and reduce the  frequency of purchases. This is what will make his present investment more successful.

loans.use: buy in larger volume, groceries, soft drinks, liquors, and meals to sell.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is 33 years old. She is married to Mohammed and together they have one child aged three years.
She has been in the grocery business for five years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000.

The loan will be used to buy stock such as kale, tomatoes, and onions from farmers. The anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for her child and also to diversify her business.


This is her second loan from KADET LTD and she has repaid it successfully. Her hopes and dreams are to have a big business selling a variety of vegetables.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, kale and onions to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a refrigerator and chips maker.

loans.name: Deth's Group

texts.en: Deth is 25 years old and the young mother of one daughter who is not yet old enough to go to school. To earn a living to pay their daily expenses, Deth and her husband grow rice on a one hectare plot of land as their main source of income. Additionally, her husband also works as a blacksmith for extra income. They can earn about 20,000 KHR per day from their current business, which they have been running for three years. Deth has taken out one previous loan from VisionFund, Kiva's partner. She repaid their loan successfully, and used it to improve her family's life. Now she is the leader of a two-person loan group which is seeking to borrow KHR 400,000 per member. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seeds, and gasoline for pumping water to her rice farm.
